channel.title: ::yell
channel.description: ::yell Wont for for hidden admin , how I can fix it + all what I try to type hidden ;S

item.title: ::yell
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“sarah, post:18, topic:464409”][quote author=imstrength link=topic=568371.msg4126883#msg4126883 date=1350541252]

final String[] ranks = new String[] { "[Owner]", "[Admin]", "[Moderator]", "[Donator]" }; if (command.startsWith("yell")) { yell(ranks[playerRights] + "[" + playerName + "]" + command.substring(5)); }

thank you i was going to post something very similar but i read through the replies first

and the lack of conventions used in all sources is quite depressing.
[/quote]

This code doesn’t work 100% i tested it and when your a mod you get [Admin] [Mod] and an owner gets [Donator][owner][/quote]

it was merely an example.

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

The yell titles go in order from playerRank 0 to 3… Rearrange the order of the yell titles. :fp:

Or you could even do

private String prefix = "";
// ... Change when logging in
if (args[0].equals("yell")) {
    sendMessage(World.getPlayers(), prefix + message);
}

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“sarah, post:6, topic:464409”][code]
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights == 3) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Owner] “+playerName+”:" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights == 2 ) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Admin] “+playerName+”:" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights == 1 ) {
	String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Moderator] "+playerName+":"  + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && donator == 1 ) {
	String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Donator] "+playerName+":"  + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

    
} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights == 4  ) {
	String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Hidden Admin] "+playerName+":"  + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

}
[/code]

but i would remove “[Hidden Admin]” because else everybody will now your a hidden admin :)[/quote]

what the fuck

final String[] ranks = new String[] { "[Owner]", "[Admin]", "[Moderator]", "[Donator]" }; if (command.startsWith("yell")) { yell(ranks[playerRights] + "[" + playerName + "]" + command.substring(5)); }

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:10, topic:464409”][quote author=sarah link=topic=568371.msg4126597#msg4126597 date=1350507532]

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights == 3) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Owner] “+playerName+”:" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && playerRights == 2 ) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Admin] “+playerName+”:" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights == 1 ) {
	String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Moderator] "+playerName+":"  + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && donator == 1 ) {
	String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Donator] "+playerName+":"  + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

    
} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights == 4  ) {
	String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Hidden Admin] "+playerName+":"  + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

}
[/code]

but i would remove “[Hidden Admin]” because else everybody will now your a hidden admin
[/quote]
This code makes me wanna cry.[/quote]
Lmfao it’s a Delta ::yell command…

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Delta:

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { String text = command.substring(5); if (playerRights == 3) yell("[Owner] "+playerName+":" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); else if (playerRights == 2) yell("[Admin] "+playerName+":" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); else if (playerRights == 1) yell("[Moderator] "+playerName+":" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); else if (donator == 1) yell("[Donator] "+playerName+":" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); else if (playerRights == 4) yell("[Player] "+playerName+":" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); else yell("[Player] "+playerName+":" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

PI:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { for (int j = 0; j < PlayerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (PlayerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)PlayerHandler.players[j]; if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) c2.sendMessage("[Owner]"+ Misc.capitalize(c.playerName) +": "+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); else if (c.playerRights == 1) c2.sendMessage("[Mod]"+ Misc.capitalize(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); else if (c.playerRights == 2) c2.sendMessage("[Admin]"+ Misc.capitalize(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); else if (c.playerRights == 4) c2.sendMessage("[Player]"+ Misc.capitalize(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); else c2.sendMessage("[Player]"+ Misc.capitalize(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } } }

Read full topic
